TopicTitle: Any Groups out there learning together?

Articles.Content:
I was wondering if there are any established discord groups / slacks etc that are meeting together to learn how to mod KSP ? was hoping to get to know some people outside of this forum that are starting out as well.

Keep it green,

Kerbal007

EOM
Since no one has built the tools I want already...  I made a New Year's Resolution to at least create a "Hello World" plug-in before the end of January.  I guess I'm almost out of time.
